I have posted to Github the R package [`limmbo2`](https://github.com/fboehm/limmbo2). `limmbo2` is a R wrapper to the freely available python module [`limmbo`](https://github.com/HannahVMeyer/limmbo). I mention my interest in `limmbo` in an earlier blog post, so I won't repeat it here.
